snippet.title: Startup Quest Bakery - Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the world of social entrepreneurship with Startup Quest Bakery, a brief simulation game that challenges you to set up and run a bakery social enterprise successfully. This game serves as a dynamic introduction to startup operations, putting your strategic decision-making to the test.

You can play it for free on Steam or Itch: 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2907700/Startup_Quest_Bakery 

https://predictcsd.itch.io/start-up-bakery

The project “E-VENTURE. Promotion of Entrepreneurship of Young People with Fewer Opportunities in Europe”


“E-VENTURE Gamification Experience - Startup Quest Bakery” was developed within the project “E-VENTURE. Promotion of Entrepreneurship of Young People with Fewer Opportunities in Europe” by Predict CSD Consulting, in collaboration with Eveho Private Foundation - Spain, Arsis - Association for the Social Support of Youth – Greece and LiberaMente - Italy

This product was created with the financial support of the European Commission. The content of this material reflects the views only of the authors and the National Agency or the European Commission cannot be held responsible for any use which may be made of the information.

“E-VENTURE Gamification Experience - Startup Quest Bakery” was made with the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere.

Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2024, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
